title: Vivian's Fashions Dress - Twist Wrap, Bridesmaid, Regular and Plus Size
features: Available in 2 lengths -?maxi (long) and mini. The Maxi is to the floor, and the mini is just above the knee
Wash in cold water, hang dry
description: The Convertible Twist Wrap...allows you or your bridesmaids to complement each other while wearing the dress style that flatters them most. The dress can be wrapped in countless ways from demure to daring. You can even do a day and evening look! How cool is that? This dress offers so much versatility and fun, but on top of all of that...it fits every body type perfectly. A tiny elastic waistband provides support and the ability to wear on your high waist, or low on the hips! An amazing design and must have for every woman whom can never make up their minds on one set style.

The Maxi Convertible Dress is perfect for formal occasions and cooler weather Fall and Winter Occasions. The Short Convertible Dress is perfect for All Occasions. Knee Grazing for a perfect length. Drape and wrap yourself in pure elegance.
Available in 2 lengths - maxi (long) and mini. The Maxi is to the floor, and the mini is just above the knee
